body_html: Instead of reading the names of the .so files and inferring the library version I could make the script read cudnn.h and look at CUDNN_MAJOR. I think that should be unambiguous -- what do you guys think about that?
body_text: Instead of reading the names of the .so files and inferring the library version I could make the script read cudnn.h and look at CUDNN_MAJOR. I think that should be unambiguous -- what do you guys think about that?
body: Instead of reading the names of the .so files and inferring the library version I could make the script read cudnn.h and look at CUDNN_MAJOR. I think that should be unambiguous -- what do you guys think about that?
